T

Transactions - Class in components
The Transactions class contains all methods needed for transactions.It establishes a connection with the database through DBConnection class.
Transactions() - Constructor for class components.Transactions
 
Transactions.type - Enum in components
The type enum contains all the types of transactions(Withdrawal,Deposit, and Transfer).
TransactionsCoordinator - Class in coordinators
The TransactionsCoordinator class is a sub class of GeneralCoordinator class it contains methods that check the user's input from HomePage and if it meets the business rules through BusinessRules and a connection to the database through Transactions class.
TransactionsCoordinator() - Constructor for class coordinators.TransactionsCoordinator
